Question: Vivoo CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Vivoo

Product: At-home digital Urinary Tract Infection (UTI) testing kit

- Takes two minutes to complete
- Analyzes test results using deep learning image processing technology
- Provides gold-standard accuracy results
- Results are obtained in seconds via the app
- Customers can connect with a doctor to obtain a prescription if needed
- Prevents confusion in readings and digitalizes data for easy sharing with healthcare providers
- Can be used by anyone wishing to diagnose a suspected UTI
- Available from Q2 2024 via Amazon and other channels
- Offers educational content in the app
- Recognized as a CES 2024 Innovation Awards honoree
